about-desc.description: I'm a web developer and a designer pursuing a degree in Computer Science and Interactive Media at Northeastern Unviersity but I'm currently studying abroad in Melbourne, Australia. I believe that any project can be 100x better with a good design. The best way to learn is by doing, so please drop me a message at huang.be@husky.neu.edu if you have a cool project you'd like to share!

project1.description: I created this homage to Tom and Jerry for my Design Studio: Concepts and Narratives final project using 1950's advertisements, paper, scissors and a lot of my free time.
project1.name: Cut-Paper Animation

project2.description: I created this 3d castle based loosely off of LOTR's Minas Morgul and a showreel with other models I created for my 3D Modelling Objects and Environment's final project
project2.name: 3d Modeling

project3.description: Throughout my journey through Australia I took a photography class and as my final project compiled my favorite pictures into a bound book
project3.name: Flickr Photography

project4.description: Here are some other pieces of art i've worked on
project4.name: Art Projects

project1.description: This is a single page application portfolio created to showcase the new skills i've acquired.
project1.name: New Portfolio

project2.description: While working at Tank I developed this brand site for ruota consulting to showcase their works as well as get them prospective clients
project2.name: Rotel

project3.description: At Tank I developed this brand site for deepis to showcase their new storage engine that creates a highly scalable database
project3.name: DeepIS

project4.description: At Tank I developed this brand site for ruota consulting to showcase their works as well as get them prospective clients
project4.name: Ruota Consulting

project5.description: This was a website showing a timeline of the notable games and consoles throughout the years up until 2015
project5.name: History of Videogames

project6.description: When I interned at B-REEL I was able to work as a front-end developer on this site. I worked along side experiences developers to create a website for the truth which is an anti-smoking campaign for teenagers to be launched during the 2014 VMAs
project6.name: the truth

project7.description: This was a group project that I worked out with a couple other students for our digital narrative class. We had to create a full interactive experience in only 2 weeks so we came up with this zombie apocalypse game.
project7.name: Carpenoctem

project8.description: This was my beginning porftolio when I first started out as a web developer that I made in 2013. I think it shows how much i've grown in skill since then.
project8.name: Old Portfolio
